segments.text: I see the water running steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the sink and spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, polishing her plate calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already wet from the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy climbs the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below has her arm up, expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, looking ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big accident quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in bright daylight on the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back nicely, framing the view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry at the carelessness here.
segments.speaker: PAR
